jsdp.app.lotsizing

Class sS_BackwardRecursion

  • java.lang.Object
    • jsdp.sdp.Recursion
      • jsdp.sdp.BackwardRecursion
        • jsdp.app.lotsizing.sS_BackwardRecursion
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    sS_SequentialBackwardRecursion

    public class sS_BackwardRecursion
extends BackwardRecursion
    A concrete implementation of a backward recursion procedure to compute (s,S) policy parameters.
    Author:
    Roberto Rossi

    • Constructor Detail

      • sS_BackwardRecursion

        public sS_BackwardRecursion(umontreal.ssj.probdist.Distribution[] demand,
                            double minDemand,
                            double maxDemand,
                            double fixedOrderingCost,
                            double proportionalOrderingCost,
                            double holdingCost,
                            double penaltyCost,
                            jsdp.app.lotsizing.sS_StateSpaceSampleIterator.SamplingScheme samplingScheme,
                            int maxSampleSize)
        Creates an instance of the problem and initialises state space, transition probability and value repository.
        Parameters:
        demand - the distribution of random demand in each period, an array of Distribution.
        minDemand - the support lower bound
        maxDemand - the support upper bound
        fixedOrderingCost - the fixed ordering cost.
        proportionalOrderingCost - the proportional (per unit) ordering cost.
        holdingCost - the proportional (per unit) holding cost; this is paid for each item brought from one period to the next.
        penaltyCost - the proportional (per unit) penalty cost; this is paid for each item short at the end of each period.
        samplingScheme - the sampling scheme used in the generation of the state space.
        maxSampleSize - the maximum sample size.
